# Definition of terms {#definition-of-terms}

```{r setup, include=F}

options(tinytex.verbose = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message=FALSE,
                      echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE)

suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(magrittr)
  })
```


<!-- The list is generated using the code below and a csv file which contains the definitions.  -->

<!-- This allows me to keep the list in order and make the best use of  -->
<!-- Pandoc's built-in definition list feature which easily translates to LaTeX. -->

```{r make-def-of-terms, results='asis'}
thesis_terms <- readr::read_csv(
  './data/lit-review-data/tables/proposal-definition-of-terms.csv',
  na = '',
  col_types = 'cc'
) %>%
  dplyr::filter(dplyr::if_all(everything(), ~ !is.na(.))) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(term) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(term = paste0("**", term, "**:")) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(entry = paste0(term, "\n\n", ":  ", definition, "\n\n"))

# this is it right here !! 
# Print the table out; it will be treated as Markdown text and inserted 
# into the document
cat(thesis_terms$entry)
```
